src: Shi kahtap tsun ai gaw, "anhte hta lai sai ten hta sai dwi ana nga ai shata 4 re ai yu ni gaw ya ten sai dwi ana nnga taw sai."
mt: 4 people were killed in the crash.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur gaw Nova Scotia ginra Halifax mare kata na Dalhousie Dakkasu a tsi hpaji sara munu re nna Canada jit dwi ana hpung a tsi gawk hte hpung tang hpaji hte seng ai daw ni a tingyang up rai nga ai Dr. Ehud Ur gaw sawk sagawn ai lam shi a ntoi a shawng daw de naw re nga ai lam hpe sadi jaw lai wa sai re.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, was found dead in his home on Monday. Police said the death was not suspicious.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Laga ninghkring ni zawn, shi mung sai dwi ann hpe mai tsi ai hpe nkam ai, dai mu tam ai ni gaw hkang 1 sai dwi ann lu ai masha ni hte hpa nseng ai re.
mt: 1 in 5 people in the world are undernourished, according to the United Nations.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Bat hpang langai ya shani hta Sara Danius, Swedish Laksan dakkasu kaw na Laili laika hte seng ai Nobel kompti a dinggrin amu madu gaw Bob Dylan hku nna kalang ta 2016 na Laili laika Nobel shagrau kumhpa hpe lu na matu ndep hkap lu ai lam hte kompti kaw na mung shi hpe lu hkra galaw ya lam ni hpe jahkring kau sai lam hpe Sweden Sveriges Radio kaw radio lamang kaw mung shawa yang hpe ndau shabra lai wa sai re.
mt: 2016 Nobel Literature laureate Sara Danius, director of the Swedish Academy, said Bob Dylan had refused to accept the award, which was to be presented in December. The academy said it had been unable to reach Dylan, who was on tour in the United States, and that it would not be possible to award the prize to him in person.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius tsun lai wa ai gaw "ya hkyak hkyak anhte ni hpa n-galaw nga ai. Ngai gaw jawm galaw ai masha ni hpe phone shaga ai lam hte email sa ai lam sa lai wa nna ahku ahkau re ai htang shana ai lam ni mung lu la lai wa sai. Ya aten na matu dai gaw kaja nan hkum tsup taw sai."
mt: "I'm not sure what happened. I was on the phone and sending emails when I heard a loud noise. I looked up and saw a fireball coming towards me."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Lai wa sai ten hta, Ring a CEO rai nga ai Jamie Siminoff gaw kam hpaga hpung gaw seng chyinghka kaw na nsen shangoi ai jak nsen nmai ngoi shi yang hpaw hpang lai wa ai re ngu nna matsing masat la lai wa sai.
mt: In the video, Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff is seen responding to the question, "What's the worst thing that could happen?" with "Someone steals a package," before the camera cuts to a shot of a package being stolen.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Shi WiFi chyinghka dingsi gyin shalat ai nga shi tsun ai.
mt: 1. The WiFi signal is weak.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff tsun ai gaw bungli nnan hpang ai ten gumhpraw sum ai lam madun ai 2013 na shi a Shark Tank langai ngut ai hpang gaw dut kaja wa ai re.
mt: 2013's most successful Shark Tank contestant, Siminoff, has been sued for fraud.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Shaning 2017 hpang daw de, Siminoff gaw gat mari QVC TV lamang hta pru wa ai.
mt: 2017 saw Siminoff appear on QVC, a home shopping network.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Dai ding tsi gaw ADT dabang kaw na shim lam kompani hpe tara jun da ai.
mt: 1. The company that owns the airport is ADT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Ebola si hkrung si htan kaw na shayawm lu na matu kalang chyam da sai makawp tsi pru wa ai ten, ya du hkra gaw nga taw ai kap bra ana hpe shamai na tsi kaga hpe atsawm shapraw da lu ai lam nnga shi ai.
mt: The Ebola outbreak has killed 1,900 people and infected 3,500 others, according to the World Health Organization.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: ZMapp, antibody cocktail gaw shang nna bungli dabang hta ga sadi madun da ai, raitim hkrak hkaja da ai lam gaw tau makawp si hkrum ai hpe mu tam ai hta akyu grau yawm ai ngu madun taw ai.
mt: ZMapp, an antibody cocktail, is currently undergoing clinical trials in the U.S. and is expected to be available to the public in 2015.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM hkrun lam hta, hkang zing na matu Zmapp hpe bang da ai, tsun mayu ai gaw hpung tang hpaji ninghkring ni gaw dai hpe npawt nhpang hku jai lang nna dai hte kaga gawn lajang na lam masum hte shingdaw na matu jai lang ai.
mt: The drug, called Zmapp, was developed by Mapp Biopharmaceutical Inc. and tested in a handful of people in the U.S. and Europe.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: US kaw na Olympic komiti hpung ni a laika hpe USA hkum mun ninghkring ni hkap la nna ginsup ninghkrin ni a shinglum lam hte ra ai lam shagu hta karum na matu hkap la da sai.
mt: 2016 Summer Olympics organizing committee has been criticized for the decision to allow Russia to compete in the games despite the country's doping scandal.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Anhte gaw anhte a ginsup masha ni hte ginsup ginra ni hpe myit shang sha ai ngu ai USOC a tsun shapraw dan ai lam hpe myit hkrum ga ai rai nna shanhte na ginsup hpan hpe anhte a uhpung kata hta masat shagrau lakmat ni hpe la kau ai nre sha shawng de sa wa nna lachyum rawng ai galai shai lam ni hte galaw dat yang gaw grau hkrak wa na re.
mt: 2012 U.S. Olympic Committee officials said they were aware of the situation and were working with the athletes to ensure they were able to compete.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymanastic gaw madun da ai ni hpe kade roi rip ai hpe lu hpaw dan na matu jek ai lam hpe madi shadaw ai re dai majaw myit ngun lu nna lawt mat ai Larry Nassar gaw aten grai na sa mat na re ngut nna ra ai ni hte galai shai ai ni hpe lu wa na re.
mt: 2018 Olympic gymnastics gold medalist Simone Biles said she was among the victims of sexual abuse by former USA Gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar, who was sentenced to 175 years in prison.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Hkum mun ginsup lam hte USOC hta bung ai pandung nga ai - dai gaw hkum mun ginsup lam hte kaga gunsup lam ni hpe ginsup ninghkring ni matu mai byin ai daram shimlum hkra, kaja ai hte makau grup yin myit n-gun shajat ya na matu galaw hkyen da ma ai re.
mt: 2012 Summer Olympics and Paralympics - The United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has been accused of misusing public funds - the USOC has been accused of misusing public funds, and of making improper payments to athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960 du hkra, Brzezinski gaw John F. Kennedy a hpaji jaw masha galaw ai, dai hpang Lyndon B. Johnson a reng hkang bungli hta bai galaw ai.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski advised John F. Kennedy, who was later succeeded by Lyndon B. Johnson after his assassination.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976 ning a lata la hpa laman, shi gaw maigan polisi a matu Carter hpe hpaji jaw salang hku mu gun ai, dai hpang Myu sha Shimlum Hpaji jaw hpung (NSA) hta 1977 kaw na 1981 du hkra galaw daw jau wa ai awng dang ai Henry Kissinger re nga ai.
mt: 1976, President Carter's National Security Advisor, Zbigniew Brzezinski, met with the Shah of Iran, who was the Director of Central Intelligence (DCI) from 1977 to 1981, Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSA zawn shi gaw Carter hpe Mungkan bungli magam ni hpe sumtsan kasa lam hku na jum lang ai lam, shaning 1978 na Camp David Accords myit hkrum lam; shaning 1970 hpang daw de na US hte Miwa a kanawn mazum ai lam hpe dingyang bai shabyin lu na matu myit sawn ai lam ni, shaning 1979 hta Iran bawng galai ai mang hkang hpe byin pru shangun ai Iran mungshawa gumlang ai lam hte shaning 1979 hta Afghanistan ginra de Soviet munghpawng hpung ni hku nna shang gasat ai lam zawn re ai ni hta karum shingtau lai wa sai re.
mt: 1978 Camp David Accords, 1970s US involvement in the Middle East, 1979 Iranian Revolution, and 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan are among the topics Carter discusses.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Ryan Gosling hte Emma Stone shang lawm ai sumla hkrung gaw madung hpan hkum sum hpa yawng hta mying tang da ai hkrum ai.
mt: 2017's La La Land won best picture, director and screenplay at the Golden Globes.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling hte Stone gaw Ningtawn dik Sumla hkrung shadang hte shayi hku na yaw shada lata da ai kaw lawm ma ai.
mt: Gosling and Stone were awarded the Best Actor and Best Actress prizes at the 2011 Golden Globe Awards.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Laga lata da ai ni kaw sumla kaja dik htum, sumla hkrung gayet ai wa, sumla hkrung madum ai, buhpun palawng lajang ai, sumla hkrung matut ai, ningpawt madang, shapraw ai madang, yung ngoi matut ai, yung ngoi gayau ai hte ningpawt sumla hkrung madun ai lam ni lawm ai.
mt: 1. The act of killing a person, 2. The act of killing a person with a weapon, 3. The act of killing a person with a weapon with the intent to kill, 4. The act of killing a person with a weapon with the intent to kill and with malice aforethought, 5. The act of killing a person with a weapon with the intent to kill and with malice aforethought and with premeditation, 6. The act of killing a person with a weapon with the intent to kill and with malice aforethought and with premeditation and with extreme atrocity or cruelty, 7. The act of killing a person with a weapon with the intent to kill and with malice aforethought and with premeditation and with extreme atrocity or cruelty and with special circumstances, 8. The act of killing a person with a weapon with the intent to kill and with malice aforethought and with premeditation and with extreme atrocity or cruelty and with special circumstances and with the use of a deadly weapon, 9. The act of killing a person with a weapon with the intent to kill and with malice aforethought and with premeditation and with extreme atrocity or cruelty and with special circumstances and with the use of a deadly weapon and with the intent to kill for financial gain, 10. The act of killing a person with a weapon with the intent to kill and with malice aforethought and with premeditation and with extreme atrocity or cruelty and with special circumstances and with the use of a deadly weapon and with the intent to kill for financial gain and with the use of a firearm.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars ngu ai sumla hkrung hta lawm ai mahkawn lahkawng gaw hkrak htum kasi madung mahkawn ni hta na langai hku nna mying shawn ai hta lawm lai wa sai. Lionsgate studio dap gaw kaga studio ni yawng hta 26 lang ting lata la hkrum na matu mying shawn katut ga sai.
mt: The song "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars" won the Oscar for Best Original Song. Lionsgate studio won the Oscar for Best Picture.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Laban shani, the United State a mungdan ningbaw Donald Trump, a shiga hpe amu madu hku na, US uhpung ni gaw Syria kaw na pru wa sai ngut shana wa ai.
mt: In a speech to the United Nations, the United States President Donald Trump, said the United States will no longer be a "world police" and will not intervene in Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Ndau shabra ai lam hpe gumsan magam Trump gaw Turkish gumsan magam wa Recep Tayyip Erdogan hte phone hku na shaga ngut ai hpang shana dat ai.
mt: Trump and Erdogan spoke by phone on Friday.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkey mungdan ni gaw ISIS ni hpe rim ai lagaw lata amu ni hta shimlum lam hpe jaw ya na re. Ndau shabra ai lam hta tsun lai wa ai gaw, Europa mungdan hku na gaw madu mungdan de bai sa kau ai lam hpe ninghkap lai wa sai re.
mt: Turkey has been bombing ISIS targets in Syria for some time.  Local media reports that the strikes have also hit Syrian government forces, which has angered the Syrian government and its allies in Europe.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Ndai gaw myi kaw na chyam bra nga ai myit jasat langai re nga ai shau htum dainusaw nkau myi kaw mun ni tu ai lam hpe shangang shakang ya ai hta sha n-ga, a hkum a tsup re ai namhkan lung ni gaw ntsa lam hku nna nmai byin ai, nsam hte myi jut masum re ai atsawm agawm hkyen lajang ai lam jawn re ai ni hpe lajang shapraw ya nga ai.
mt: 1. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 2. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 3. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 4. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 5. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 6. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 7. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 8. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 9. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease. 10. The government has been accused of not doing enough to prevent the spread of the disease.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Hpanji rawng ni tsun ai gaw dai dusat ni a amun gaw tit e hpun hkrang ntsa kaw nrai nna hkrang nja ai dai nrai carotenoid hkrang npu kaw nga ai re.
mt: The study found that eating carrots can help prevent the development of cataracts.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Shanhte gaw u ni a mun tu wa ai sinda masa lam hpe mu tam la ma ai.
mt: The incident is under investigation.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Dinosaur amun gaw atsawm nkaba wa ai majaw, rachis ngu shaga ai re, raitim shanhte kaw magaw magaw re ngut nna barbules zawn - amun ni nga ai kun - hpaji rawng ni shadu ai gaw rachis zawn amun ni gaw hpang de amun ni zawn kaba wa ai re.
mt: The dinosaur's tail was covered in feathers, but the feathers were not the same as those on modern birds. The feathers on the dinosaur's tail were barbules, which are the basic building blocks of feathers. The feathers on the dinosaur's tail were not the same as those on modern birds.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Sing kaw hkrang ni hpaji jaw ai lam gaw, shanhte hpe pyenli hkawm ai lam hta njai lang ai sha grau nna gaw kahtet shadang hkang zing ai lam madun ai lam a matu rai nga ai. Sawk sagawn ai masha ni hpaji jaw ai lam gaw, ndai gaw chyaloi nhkoi prat na dusat dinosaur a a-mai rai tim mung, kasi madun ai rai gaw sak kung ai u mun re ngu ai hte u hkai kasha a u mun kalung nre ngu ai hpe madun nga ai.
mt: The cause of the crash is still unknown. Local media reports that the pilot was a former member of the Thai air force and had been flying for 30 years. The dinosaur-shaped plane was built by a local company and was used for advertising.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Sawk tam ai ni hpaji jaw lai wa ai lam gaw ndai gaw dinosaur kaji a mai re nga tim hkrang sumla kaw gaw u kasha a mun nre ai sha sak kung sai u kaba a mun hpe madun nga ai re.
mt: The study found that the dinosaurs' extinction was not caused by a meteorite impact, but by a volcanic eruption that released massive amounts of sulphuric acid into the atmosphere.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Mani jahpawt hta Turkey a Gaziantep na pyada dap ginjaw hta mawdaw bawm kapawt nna pyada du lahkawng si hkrum ai hte kaga masha hkun jan hkala nba hkrum lai wa sai.
mt: 12 people were killed and 34 injured in a car bomb attack in Gaziantep, Turkey.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Aup hkang du rung kaw na gaw pya da du shi jahku hkala hkrum ai nga ndau shana sai.
mt: 2 people were killed in the crash.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Pyada la wa tsun lai wa ai gaw, shanhte gaw htim gasat ai na matu lit nga ai ngu shadu da ai gasat myit rawt ai Daesh (ISIL) hpe nrup nsen ai re.
mt: The group has claimed responsibility for the attack, saying it was carried out by a "soldier of the caliphate" in response to the government's recent military operations in the area.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Shanhte ni gaw Jan mung laga shagan ni zawn bung ai ningpawt ninghpang tara kaw bungli galaw ai lam hpe mu lai wa sai re. Gawda hkrang kata na shagan yawng a bungli galaw ai lam gaw shanhte a htoi tu ai lam, shanhte a gayin ai lam ni a gau hkang hkrum ai lu matu re ai hte laga hpa nre ai lam hpe mu lai wa sai re.
mt: 1. The incident occurred at around 1:30 pm local time. 2. The incident occurred at around 1:30 pm local time. 3. The incident occurred at around 1:30 pm local time.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Htoi tu ai lam hte gayin ai lam ni hpe gaw dat yi,la n-gun bung dat nsa masa hte seng nga ai shata langai a Rossby nambat hpe myit sawn jep jen ai lam hta arau sha jai lang ai re.
mt: The study, published in the journal Nature, found that the Rossby waves, which are caused by the rotation of the Earth, can affect the jet stream and cause it to slow down or speed up.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Dai grau kaji ai Rossby nambat, hpri kap ai hpe nhti nhtang galaw ai nkaja ai shagan.
mt: The Rossby wave, which is a large-scale wave in the atmosphere, is thought to be responsible for the jet stream.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasaki gaw shi a hkrun lam kadun laman shara law law kaw manghkang amyu myu hkrum sha lai wa sai.
mt: Iwasaki said the plane was flying at an altitude of 300 meters when it crashed.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Shi hpe panglai damya ni rim da ma ai, gwi mana langai gaw Tibet kaw wa htim gawa wa ai, Nepal kaw na hkumran poi na hprawng wa ai hpang Kala kaw rim hkrum ai.
mt: The incident occurred in the area of Tibet, where the river flows into Nepal, and the Kali river.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n madang gaw 2.4Ghz hte 5.0Ghz lang shadang (frequencies) lahkawng hpe galaw shakri da wa ai.
mt: 802.11n uses both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Ndai gaw ndai hpe 802.11a, 802.11b hte 802.11g hte hpangde htap htuk wa hkra ahkang jaw wa na re nna madung dabang gaw nsen shapoi jak lahkawng lu ai hpe lajang ya lai wa sai re.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all wireless networking standards that are susceptible to interference from other devices.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n a chyang shadang gaw shi hta shawng pru ai law dik htum 600Mbit/s chyang shadang nga ai jak ni hta grau lawan ai hpe mu lu ai.
mt: 802.11n can provide up to 600Mbit/s of bandwidth, but the technology is still in its infancy.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ma lahkawng hte hkumran ai, gaw Miller na matu myit grai ngang lu ai re, dai mawng moi hte seng ai ni a matu.
mt: 28-year-old Duvall, who was found dead in the water, had a gunshot wound to the head, police said.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Ningmu jaw na matu san ai shaloi, Miller tsun ai gaw, "Madat la ai ten hta Mike gaw ga grai shaga ai... dai majaw shi hpa ni tsun taw ai hpe ngai atsam nna dat ai.
mt: "Mike was a great guy... he was a great guy to work with," said Miller.
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Shanhte gaw carbon dioxide shayawm na matu GDP unit langai shagu hta grai hkrak ai margin hte shaning 2005 level kaw na shanging 2020 du hkra shakut na re ngu" Hu tsun wa ai.
mt: "The world's carbon dioxide emissions are expected to grow by 20 percent between 2005 and 2020, according to the report," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Dai di na matu shi ngalaw wa ai, ngut tsun let China a hpaga galaw ai hta shanhte hpe galaw da ai.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 injured when a bus crashed in China.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu gaw mungkan ga ntsa kaw na nbung hpe nmasa na gaw shawng re ngut nna san seng gai gaw hpang re ngu tsun nna ya she galu gaba wa ai mungdan ni hpe ngun jaw ai.
mt: The government has said it will provide free treatment to all patients with cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Kahtap nna shi gaw " kaning raitim shanhte hpe shanhte a bawng ring lam, lamang hte galaw lu ai atsam hta jan ai lit ni n jaw ging ai" ngu mung kahtap tsun ai.
mt: "We are not going to allow the people to be killed, injured or displaced by the fighting," the statement said.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Iraq mungdan hkaja uhpung ni gaw shanhte a sumtang laika hpe dai ni na GMT 12:00 aten kaw tang madun lai wa sai re.
mt: 12:00 GMT on Sunday, Iraq's government announced a curfew in the capital Baghdad.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Iraq kaw na majan shabyin taw ai lam, dawsa ai grau jat wa ai lam, makam masham langai hte langai tsat hkat ai ni hpe kadai mung nlu jahkring ai gaw kadai mung makawp maga ai npu kaw nnga ai ngu sadi jaw ai re.
mt: Iraqi officials say the attack was in retaliation for a U.S. air strike that killed 15 people in the town of Abu Ghraib.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Singpraw ka'ang de na polisi hte seng na United States hta myit hkrum hpawng a shiga lamang hte shingjawng ndang hkat ai lam na matu ninghkap laika hpe Sumtang hta hpaw tsun wa ai.
mt: Police in the United States have arrested a man in connection with a bomb threat at a Sumter, South Carolina, airport.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Sumtang laika gaw Iraq de du hkra mungdan uphkang magam daw a daini na hkrang masa ni a dawsang yang ngu na garam a matu grai ahkyak ai re nna ndai gaw lam mahkrun ni kalang ta galai shai ai lam hpe shadut taw nga ai re.
mt: The Iraqi government has been accused of using chemical weapons against its own people.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Ndai madi shadaw laika 78 kaw na alat ningshawng gaw Iraq ga jarit hpe hpyen ni shang shalau ai kaw na makawp maga na hte shi a htingbu mungdan ni hte sum tsan kasa kanawn mazum ai lam ni hpe bai gaw gap na matu sumtsan kasa hte seng ai ningshawng lahkam ning nan hpe dai ning nhtum shi yang galaw hpang sa wa ra ai lam re nga ai.
mt: 78 people were killed and 150 were injured in Iraq when a car bomb exploded in a crowded market in the city of Baquba.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ndai laman na lahta rapdaw amat hte Argentina a alat ningshawng num re nga ai Christina Fernandez de Kirchner gaw mana maga shi a gumsan magam hte seng nna shang shingjawng na share gaw Beenos Aires kaw nna kilometer 50 (deng 31) tsan ai mare langai rai nga ai La Plata mare kaw re ai lam hpe ndau shana lai wa sai.
mt: 50 kilometers (31 miles) south of Buenos Aires, Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner was involved in a car accident in which her motorcade was hit by a truck.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Jan. Kirchner hku nna, shi gumsan magam byin na matu Argentine poi yu ginra kaw shingjawng ai a yaw shada lam gaw 2005 ning hta Buenos Aires ginwang dat kasa hpung a campaign hta shi hpung shang masha hku nna shawng galaw hpang wa ai shara re ai majaw re ngu ndau shabra dat ai.
mt: 2005, Argentine President Néstor Kirchner, who died of a heart attack at age 60, was elected in a campaign that promised to end the country's economic crisis.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Ndai dangrang hkat ai lam gaw Katrina laru byin ai hpang "Bush's New Orleans Deal" masat laika ntsa hkye mawai lam hte bai gaw gap ai lam ni hta gumhpraw jai na n jai na hte seng nna ningdang kalang ai kaw na npawt sharawt wa ai re.
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina evacuee Katrina laru byin ai hpang "Bush's New Orleans Deal" masat laika ntsa hkye mawai lam hte bai gaw gap ai lam ni hta gumhpraw jai na n jai na hte seng nna ningdang kalang ai kaw na npawt sharawt wa ai re.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Bai gaw gap shakut shaja ai a myit dam lada ai dinglun lam gaw Washinton nga masha ni sadi maram lu na matu bai gaw gap ai myit hkrum ga shaka hpe shagrau sha a ai hta maju jung da ai.
mt: The Washington Post reported that the man who was shot by police was a suspected bank robber.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Masha wan mali jan Roma de yawn hkyen hpawng lawm na matu sa wa sai re.
mt: 1,000 people were killed in the city of Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Sa ai masha grai law ai majaw makoi mayang hku hpyi na matu St. Peter' Square shara kaw shara ngu ai.
mt: 1,000 people were killed in the attack on St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Rome kaw gaw dai lamang hpe masha ni lu yu na matu shara law law wa hta sumla hkrung madun pat kaba law law hpe tawn da nga ai.
mt: In Rome, the city's mayor has ordered the removal of all the city's Christmas trees after a fire in one of them killed a man.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Italy na mare kaba law law hte mungkan ting na mare kaba ni, grau nna Poland na mare kaba ni gaw bung bung re na gaw sharawt da ai hpe masha unawng uwa kaw na mu mada ma ai.
mt: Italy's 2013 budget deficit is expected to be 2.5 percent of GDP, while Poland's is expected to be 2.9 percent. The European Commission has said that both countries must reduce their deficits.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Laubau ninghkring ni gaw lai sai ten na FBI polisi ni sawk sagawn loi ai mabyin ni hpe sha tam ma ai, grau nna gaw dat kasa ni a awngdang ai madang hta yaw shada ai la nga ai hte mawdaw lagu ai mabyin ni hpe sha galaw taw ai majaw mara shangun ma ai.
mt: The FBI has arrested a man who allegedly threatened to kill the president and members of Congress, according to the U.S. Attorney's Office.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Upadi ka rapdaw gaw shaning 2005 sut gumhpraw lam hta kinsha lasha ningshawng lahkam lam hte seng na karum gumhpraw jai lang na lam tsun hpang ai hte FBI gaw masha kaba masai marai re ai baw hpe shalat ai 10 hpe atsawm tam sawk na matu laksan shatsam sai.
mt: 2005 saw the first time the FBI arrested more than 10 people in a single sting operation.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa gaw bawlung 41 hpe 11 lang hte 2 lang gayet nna 70 lu lagat nna madang tsaw htum ai masat hpe lu galaw lai wa sai.
mt: 41-year-old Robin Uthappa was shot in the leg and chest and died at the scene.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Lapran na kriket gasup ai ni, Sachin Tendulkar hte Rahul Dravid gaw atsawm sha ginsup lai wa nna Latsa-gat nna rau galaw ai lam hpe lu galaw lai wa sai.
mt: 2006 Cricket World Cup, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid were the only two players to score a century in the same match.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Kaning rai tim, ningbaw wa a wicket shadung sum mat ai shaloi Kala gaw 36 lang sha lu nna wicket 7 sum mat ai.
mt: 36-year-old Kala was killed by a bullet in the head and chest, and seven others were injured.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: U.S mungdan a gumsan magam George W. Bush gaw November shata 16 ya shani hta shi a bat mi na na Asha dan kawan hkawm ai lam hpang na matu Singapore mungdan de du sai.
mt: 16 November 2007, former U.S. President George W. Bush and his wife Laura visited Singapore.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Shi gaw Singapore mungdan a ningtau hkringmang daju Wong Kan Seng a hkap tau shakram la ai hkrum nna, hkringmang daju Lee Hsien Loong hte gaw hpaga yumga lam hte dawsa masa lam ni bawng ban jahta sai.
mt: Singapore's former education minister, Wong Kan Seng, and current Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong, were among those who attended the funeral.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Midterm ra lata poi hta sum ai bat myi na mat ai hpang, Bush gaw lamang washa masha ni hpe Asia dan a hpaga yumga kaba jat wa ai lam hte seng nna tsun dan lai sai.
mt: 2004 U.S. presidential election results show that Bush won the popular vote in Asia, but lost the electoral vote.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Stephen Harper Hkringmang daju gaw bat lahkawng ya shani na PMO kaw NDP ningbaw wa hte hkrum tsup bawng ban hpawng minit 25 galaw ngut nna asuya a "nbung jasan ai magam bungli" hpe party komiti shagu de bai jep maram yu na lam sa dat na matu myit hkrum lai wa sai.
mt: 25 minutes ago, NDP leader Thomas Mulcair accused Prime Minister Stephen Harper of "misleading the public" in a speech to his party's caucus.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton gaw hkringmang daju hte hkrum zup ai shaloi mungding myu tsaw myit rawng ai ni a grupyin masa hte seng ai gumhpraw hpyi chyarang hpe galai shai ai lam ni galaw ya na matu, "azin ayang hkum hkum tsup tsup" kalang bai ka ya na matu hpyi shawn da ai re.
mt: The  incident  was  caught  on  video  by  a  bystander,  who  said  he  heard  a  loud  "boom"  and  saw  the  plane  explode  in  flames.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Federal Asuya kaw na Devonport na Mersey tsi rung hpe zing la na lahkam wa ai shaloi kaw na Tasmania, mungdaw asuya hte kaga federal hkring mang daju nkau mi gaw ndai hku galaw ai hpe shataman shi langai hta galaw na federal ra lata lamang a ningshawng kumla langai hku na shawa myit shang sha hkra dingsang galaw ai lam langai re ngu nna mara tam shagun ma ai.
mt: The Federal Government has announced that the Devonport-based Mersey class patrol boat will be decommissioned and replaced by a new vessel, with the new ship to be built in Tasmania. The decision to decommission the Mersey class was made after a review of the Federal Government's naval shipbuilding program, which found that the vessels were not cost-effective and were not able to meet the needs of the Australian Defence Force.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Raitim Hkring mang Daju John Howard gaw ndai tara upadi gaw AUD$ wan 45 kahtap jaw ai hku na Tasmanian asuya kawn madang hkrat ya ai kaw na tsi rung a matu makawp maga na matu sha re hpe tsun da ai.
mt: Former Prime Minister John Howard said the government should spend AUD$45 million to build a new prison in Tasmania.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Dai shiga tsun ai gaw, panglai hka rawt wa ai gaw tsunami hpe byin shagu wa ai ngu madun wa ai. Pago Pago hte Niue makau kaw tsunami byin na lam ni nga taw ai.
mt: The tsunami was caused by an undersea earthquake, according to the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center. The tsunami hit the islands of Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tonga kaw hpa nhten ai dai nrai ana lu ai mung nnga ai, raitim wan gaw chyhkring hten ai, PTWC kaw na tsunami sadi jaw ai hpe lu la na ai kaw na Tongan mung aup ni hpe pat da ai.
mt: The tsunami warning was issued after a 7.6 magnitude earthquake struck 60 miles (97 kilometers) from the capital, Nuku'alofa, at a depth of 6.2 miles (10 kilometers), according to the U.S. Geological Survey. The Pacific Tsunami Warning Center said a tsunami was generated, but it was not expected to be destructive.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Hkinggau mayan (sh) Hawaii na hpaji jawng shi mali hpe sadi jaw hkrum ai majaw Dam shani kaw na pat kau sai.
mt: 1,000 miles (1,600 km) from Hawaii, a Japanese fishing boat was found adrift with no crew.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: U.S Gumsan magam George W. Bush gaw dai ndau laika hpe hkap tau la ai.
mt: 2001-2009 U.S President George W. Bush has died.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bush a tsun shaga ahkang lu ai wa re nga ai Gordon Johndroe gaw dingdung Korea a ga sadi hpe "Korea hte seng ai zundawn a tengman nna shingra dat n-gun lang ai hpe shayawm ai lam a pan dung hpe lu la na matu ahkyak ai numdaw re ai lam" re ai ngu tsun lai wa sai re.
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the U.S. is "deeply concerned" about North Korea's reported plans to test a long-range missile.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Shi lang ngu shamying da ai Atlantic Hurricane nbung laru numdaw na, Kahtet yawm ginra na nbung laru Jerry gaw dai ni sha Atlantic nammuk dara hta hpang wa sai.
mt: 2013 Atlantic hurricane season begins with the formation of Tropical Storm Andrea, the first named storm of the season.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Amyu sha laru makawp ginjaw (NHC) tsun ai gaw, ndai madang hta lamu ga de hkrit tsang hpa nnga ai ngu Jerry mara da nga ai.
mt: The National Hurricane Center said the storm was expected to strengthen to a hurricane by Tuesday.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: U.S mungdan a jak ninghkrin ni gaw yungnu bat kru daram nga ai marang gaw moi hten ga ai hka hkinbawng hpe waw shangun na re ngu sawn yu ma ai.
mt: The U.S. military has been using the technology to detect roadside bombs in Iraq and Afghanistan.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Katrina laru laman pe 20 daram tsaw hkra hka kaba ai hpe mu da ai jahku ngu na mare lawk gaw ya ten hta makau kaw nga ai hka hkinbawng lup mat ai majaw hka gaw ginshang du hkra tsaw taw nga ai.
mt: 20 people were killed in a landslide in the area of the village of Jahku, which was hit by a storm on Monday, according to local officials.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Hka ni gaw hka hkinbawng a pe 100 dam ai shara ni hku lai na hkaw taw nga ai.
mt: 100 meters of the river bank was damaged.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Uphkang du Adam Cuerden gaw lai wa sai shata hta shi Wiki shiga dap hte shaga ai lam hpe shaprai kau ya ai lam a ntsa shi a pawt sindawng ai hpe madun dan lai wa sai.
mt: Adam Cuerden has been credited with the creation of this article.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "[Wale masha] shi hku na nnan kaw na anhte hpe madung hku na masu lai wa sai. Shang nnan, ndai gaw tara shang ai madi madun lam hku na hkrang shala ai. Dai hpang, shi anhte a ga hpe madat masu su nna kalang ta hpa nchye ai zawn re nna shara la mat ai."
mt: "[The pilot] was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land the plane safely. He was able to land
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Masha uhpung a masin pawt ai lam ni gaw dai ginra kaw hprang hprang re nna tara shang ai shiga dap ni wan hku hpaw tawn nna ya hkyak hkyak e galaw nga ai ngang hte seng a hkrang tara ni hpe laika hkrang hku nna galaw sa wa na matu madi madun ya nga ai.
mt: 3 people were injured when a car crashed into a tree and burst into flames.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Bungli ngut ai gaw myit jasat hku na malawng re raitim, dai lamang hpe gaw Sagittarius mali shingna hte galaw da ai hku hkrang shala na matu ka da ai.
mt: The crash occurred during a training flight, and the aircraft was a single-seat, single-engine jet trainer of the Sagittarius series.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Dai tam ai uhpang gaw galaxy's dark matter hte Milky Way's dark matter ni a myit shang sha ai lam ni a majaw byin wa ai re.
mt: The study suggests that the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter are not the same.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Shata wa mungkan ga hpe gang ai shaloi hkaleng ni byin wa ai zawn Milky way mung Sagittarius mali shingna hpe nang ai n-gun nga ai.
mt: The galaxy is located about 26,000 light-years from Earth in the constellation Sagittarius.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Hpaji rawng ni gaw dark matter gaw laga dark matter ni galaw ai zawn galaw ai ngu chyhtum hta tsun wa ai.
mt: The researchers say the new data suggest that dark matter is not made of particles, but instead of some other phenomenon.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Ndai myit jasat tsun ai gaw mali shingna makau na htat chyang ai hkrang rai ni gaw mali shingna makau na shingkang nhtoi hpan kata kaw nga nga ai re nna shing-yun shing-yaw kaji grai law wa mi hte galaw da ai re.
mt: The report said the plane was carrying 10 crew members and 10 passengers, all of whom were killed.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Hkrangmu shiga kaw tang madun ai lam hta hpun kaw na wanhkut pru ai hpe mu lu ai.
mt: 2 people were injured in the crash.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Buga na up hkang salang ni gaw dai kaw shanu nga ai ni hpe nta kata kaw nga na matu, nbung katsi jaw ai jak ni pat da na matu hte hka nsan ai n lu na matu sadi jaw taw ma ai.
mt: 3 people were killed and 2 injured in a car accident in the province of Chiang Mai.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Janpan a nuclear the seng nna, radioactive caesium ngut nna iodien in hpe mungkan kaw myit shamyit ma ai.
mt: 1,000 times the legal limit of radioactive caesium and 500 times the legal limit of radioactive iodine were found in the soil.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Darum magam lu ai hpung ni gaw ndai gaw bungli dabang kaw radio dat shapraw ya ai sau ni hpe bang tawn ai ndum gaw mai kapaw ga ai hte kayun nga ai lam hpe madi madun nga ai ngu tak maram yu sawn la ma ai.
mt: The plane was on a training flight and was not carrying any passengers, the military said.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll gaw dingda Africa ginra re nga ai Kwazulu-Natal kaw namhpan hpe grai laja lana re hkra ninghkap lu ai Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) hpe sawk tam mu lai wa sai re.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll said the province of Kwazulu-Natal had the highest number of cases of the drug-resistant form of tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: San-htai hta, shi gaw masa shai ai hku tsun ai, "Grai tsaw ai shadang majaw manghkang hte shadum ai lam grai tsaw ai."
mt: "The plane was on a training mission," said a spokesman.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Machyi masha nkau mi gaw tsirung kaw shakrep kaw na ana kap la ai ngu tsi sarawun Moll shadu ai, bai nna yawm htum marai lahkawng gaw tsirung kaw bungli galaw ai ni re.
mt: The Moll family, who were on their way to a family reunion, were killed in the crash, according to a relative.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
